title: Buck Godot: Gallimaufry
description: More adventures of Phil Foglio's Science-Fiction detective who is "Always Available, But Never Free." This self-contained story takes Buck to the galactic center of government, the Gallimaufry, where a plot to wipe out humanity is underfoot. This convenient backpack-sized, black and white edition contains the entire Gallimaufry storyline, plus extra material
author: Phil Foglio
